[[File:Galaxy Nexus smartphone.jpg|thumb|[[Galaxy Nexus]], part of the [[Google Nexus|Nexus series]]]] '''Samsung Galaxy''' may refer to any of several mobile computing devices produced by [[Samsung Electronics]], all of which use the [[Android (operating system)|Android]] operating system.
==Smartphones== * [[Samsung i5500]] (Samsung Galaxy 5/550/Europa) * [[Samsung i5700]] (Samsung Galaxy Spica/Portal) * [[Samsung i5800]] (Samsung Galaxy 3/Apollo) * [[Samsung i7500]] (Original Samsung Galaxy) * [[Samsung Galaxy 551]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Ace]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Skin]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Fit]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Gio]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Mini]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Prevail]] * [[Samsung Galaxy R]] * [[Samsung Galaxy S]] * [[Samsung Galaxy S II]] * [[Samsung Galaxy W]] * [[Samsung Exhibit 4G]] * [[Samsung Stratosphere]] * [[Galaxy Nexus]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Y]]
==Tabphones== * [[Samsung Galaxy Note]]
==Tablets== * [[Samsung Galaxy Tab]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Tab 7.7]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Tab 8.9]] * [[Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1]]
==Media players== * [[Samsung Galaxy Player]]
==Categorization== Since August 2011 all products of the Galaxy-Series from Samsung are categorized in the following way<ref>[http://www.computerbild.de/artikel/cb-News-Handy-Samsung-Galaxy-Smartphone-Konzept-IFA-Premiere-6413000.html In German: Samsungs Smartphone-Klassifizierung]</ref>: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Letter !! Meaning !! Product-Class or Targetgroup |- |align="center"| S || Super Smart || High-End devices |- |align="center"| R || Royal || Highclass devices |- |align="center"| W || Wonder || heigh-valued middleclass devices |- |align="center"| M || Magical || sufficient use for small money |- |align="center"| Y || Young || Entry-Level / young users |}
